data.title: Kelly Clarkson: Credits, Bio, News & More
data.meta_description: Searching to find out more about Kelly Clarkson? We have a full Biography, Photos, Theatre Credits, TV and Movies, Videos and more! Check out Kelly Clarkson's bio now including film and tv, as well as on stage.
data.text:
Kelly Clarkson News

THE NOTEBOOK's Original Broadway Cast Recording Now Available on CD

The Notebook (Original Broadway Cast Recording) is available now on CD and offered for purchase at the Schoenfeld Theatre.

Paris Paloma Releases Cinematic Single 'the warmth'

The rising UK artist has shared her latest single, “the warmth,” where she sings in unfurling harmonies, spectral with full-bodied pop, and a determined percussive march building like a personal artillery. Listen to the song now!

Westport Country Playhouse Honors Kristin Chenoweth And Mary-Mitchell Campbell At September Fundraiser

Westport Country Playhouse will honor Kristin Chenoweth and Mary-Mitchell Campbell at a special fundraiser on September 14.

UK Premiere Of Magician Asi Wind's INCREDIBLY HUMAN After Sold-Out New York Season

Magician Asi Wind's INCREDIBLY HUMAN premieres in the UK following a sold-out season in New York.

THE KING'S WIFE A New Musical Begins Next Week At Adirondack Theatre Festival

Adirondack Theatre Festival has announced starry casting for its concert presentation of the new musical, The King's Wife, as part of its 30th Anniversary Season. The presentation of the new musical runs July 19 - 21.

Wake Up With BroadwayWorld July 11, 2024

Rise and shine, BroadwayWorld! It is July 11, 2024 and it's time to catch up on all of the theatrical happenings you may have missed in the last 24 hours.

Video: Vanessa Williams Talks Singing New Elton John Songs in THE DEVIL WEARS PRADA

Vanessa Williams stopped by The Kelly Clarkson Show on Wednesday to discuss the new musical version of The Devil Wears Prada. She is currently playing the role of Miranda Priestly (played by Meryl Streep in the film) in the stage musical, which features an Elton John score. Watch the interview!

Asi Wind's INCREDIBLY HUMAN Will Make its UK Premiere in September

Tickets are now on sale for the UK premiere of ASI WIND’S new magic show INCREDIBLY HUMAN. Previewing at the Underbelly Boulevard in Soho from 3 September, the show will run for an initial 4 month season.

Crash Adams Releases New Summer Anthem 'Hotel Party'

Get ready to turn up the heat this summer with Crash Adams’ electrifying new single “Hotel Party.” Packed with infectious beats and irresistible hooks, this high-energy pop anthem promises to kick your summer party playlist into overdrive. Listen to it now!

Comedian Leanne Morgan to Perform At Fox Cities P.A.C. in September

Comedian Leanne Morgan is set to perform at the Fox Cities Performing Arts Center. Learn more about the show and see how to purchase tickets.

Singer Songwriter Sam Paige Drops 'People Pleaser' Single

Sam Paige has released her new single “People Pleaser” along with a music video. The song came to life during a co-write with Nashville, TN Producer Alex Seier and is a direct reflection of her life and experiences. Listen to the song now!

Paris Paloma to Play November UK Headline Tour

Rising artist Paris Paloma will embark on her second UK headline tour, launching in Manchester on 17th November and culminating in Leeds on 28th November, with her fifth headline London show taking place at KOKO on 20th November. The 9-date tour follows her recent sold-out debut UK headline tour, which saw her play packed out shows in Edinburgh, Manchester, Birmingham, Bristol and London.

Andra Day to Play 'CHERITH Tour' Across North America

This summer, multi-platinum powerhouse vocalist, Grammy® winner, Golden Globe Winner, and Academy Award nominee Andra Day returns to the road on her headline CHERITH Tour 2024 across North America. This jaunt kicks off on August 9 in Atlanta, GA, at Variety Playhouse, visiting major markets before it and concludes on September 24 in Seattle, WA, at The Showbox.

TWICE's NAYEON Releases Highly Anticipated Sophomore EP 'NA'

NAYEON, of the critically acclaimed K-Pop powerhouse TWICE, has released her sophomore solo EP NA. This release follows NAYEON’s first highly successful solo venture in 2022 with the release of IM NAYEON. Listen to the EP now!

Meet Me @ The Altar Release Pop-Punk Cover of Jonas Brothers Smash Hit 'Sucker'

Critically acclaimed rock trio Meet Me @ The Altar have released a pop-punk cover of Jonas Brothers’ 2019 smash hit “Sucker.” Swapping out the original’s laidback, summer vibe for crunchy guitars, hard-hitting percussion, and frontwoman Edith Victoria’s powerful vocals, the trio turns the breezy track into an arena-ready pop-punk anthem. Listen to the new cover!

Review: JAZZ EMU: KNIGHT FEVER, Soho Theatre

Knight Fever sees the return of the narcissistic pop star character, Jazz Emu, this time vying for a Knighthood at the Royal Variety Show. The character, created and played by Archie Henderson, has done several shows in the past and has gone viral on social media for his hilarious and catchy songs.

See the Full List of Winners for The 51st Annual Daytime Emmy Awards

The National Academy of Television Arts & Sciences (NATAS) has announced the winners of the 51st Annual Daytime Emmy® Awards, held tonight at the Westin Bonaventure Hotel in historic downtown Los Angeles. The ceremony was broadcast live on CBS at 8:00 PM ET/PT and streamed on Paramount+.* This year marked the 18th time CBS has broadcast the Daytime Emmy® Awards, more than any other network.

Video: Eddie Redmayne and Gayle Rankin Talk CABARET Tony Nominations

Eddie Redmayne and Gayle Rankin stopped by The Kelly Clarkson Show to discuss Cabaret at the Kit Kat Club, now playing at the August Wilson Theatre. In Cabaret, Redmayne plays 'The Emcee', a role played by Joel Grey in the 1966 and 1987 Broadway productions. He performs alongside Gayle Rankin as Sally Bowles, replacing Jessie Buckley from the West End production. Watch the full interview!

51st Annual Daytime Creative Arts Emmy Awards Announced - Full List of Winners!

Robert Downey Jr., Dwayne Wade, and Buddy Valastro win their first-ever Daytime Creative Arts Emmys at the 51st awards ceremony. Discover the highlights and other winners from this prestigious event.
